website_summaries.verdict: Has all the necessary features, including Dolby Atmos, Meridian Audio, and Chromecast compatibility, and works with Google Assistant.
pros: It has 550 watts worth of power, and it uses a 5.2.1 channel system
The system boasts an audiophile-grade speaker design
cons: This wouldn't be an easy version to wall-mount under a TV

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly was very impressed with this sound bar. I noticed a lot of bad reviews but I went ahead and bought it anyways. The sound quality is excellent and I was honestly confused why other folks had issues with it. When I watch movies or TV shows the voices come through nice and crisp. Music sounds great as well. I was also very happy with how easy it was to setup. It literally took me 5 minutes. Very pleased with this sound bar and I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler H.

customer_reviews.title: Sound is always out of sync
customer_reviews.text: There is a major issue with this and that is that the sound is always out slightly to largely out of sync. And yes, I know it has an option to correct for this, but it does not go in the correct direction. The sound is DELAYED, and the option for fixing this only lets you increase the delay. I have a cablebox, apple tv, xbox one all connected to my TV, and from TV to soundbar I have tried both an optical cable and HDMI (arc). In ever scenario, the sound is slightly lagged behind the video. I have tried the latest updates to no avail. Very disappointed, wish I could return it, but I waited too long :(
customer_reviews.author: A. Stanciu

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Ignore the Bad Reviews
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic, and at a great price. The audio quality is fantastic, and it’s super easy to setup. There are no audio sync or issues with speech. The idiotic bad reviews here almost made me not order this product. People most likely misconfigured their bar and then complained. I would absolutely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds with the app!
customer_reviews.text: Great soundbar! Everything I was wanting from an Atmos soundbar. I chose this because of Google assistant integration. It isn't a smart speaker but does automatically turn on when casting to "home group". It does require the app download for full functionality however. But using the app is easier than digging around for the remote. Also you need the app to update the soundbar anyways which you should do before even using it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Winter

customer_reviews.title: Need to have understanding neighbors.
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about it. Awesome. Pairs quite well with my OLED Signature TV
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Heath

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do an extensive sound but for my ears everything sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: namkyu

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!! Trust me or be prepared to return
customer_reviews.text: Very inconsistent sound Sub woofer cut in and out from time to time
customer_reviews.author: wesley griffith

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound bar
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with the LG SK10Y sound bar quality and value, although, I don’t think the surround sound would have been nearly as good if I hadn’t also purchased the rear speaker kit (you have to get the rear speakers!). Dialog was sometimes drowned out by background noise/music, but I cranked the center channel way up, and it’s much better now. It integrates perfectly with my LG TV, so I don’t need to use the sound bar remote. If you need to change the individual speaker/channel volumes, as I did, it’s much easier to do using the mobile app.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product was ok at best despite all the good reviews. The center speaker was muted and lost in the back ground noise along with the under powered rear speakers. The other main issue I had with this soundbar was the lack of bass and awful lip sync issues I had. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Needs setup and tweaking to make It great.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box is sounds great if ya love that heavy bass and feel of the movie. The problem is the vocals on many movies are drown out and make it hard to hear what people are saying. A firmware update did help this, but I can only get amazing sound out of ASC mode, Do not use movie mode. Once ya set it up it perfect and sounds amazing
customer_reviews.author: Zigma

customer_reviews.title: Average Performance - 6 Year old $200 Polk Soundbar sounds way better
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised Dolby Atmos is great .... I'm not easily impressed but the overall sound quality is average dynamics, smooth and setup was easy. Connected with HDMI 2.1 improves performance. You'll need to download the LG Wi-fi Speaker app from the playstore (or iTunes if your stuck with an iPhone), update the speaker firmware and your off to the races. I have had some issues with lip-sync on youtube otherwise good elsewhere , the virtual surround, is well virtually non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love how this looks and sounds
customer_reviews.text: This bar sounds amazing. I haven't tried out its surround or anything yet but music sounds so good. I am very impressed with this unit. My only complaint is if something touches the subwoofer while watching TV it loses signal for a second. Other than that it's been amazing
customer_reviews.author: Darick Petrik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and sounds GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price here as I checked all other stores etc, and they were all $900 or more. Highly recommend this if you have a desire for some good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sk9y better
customer_reviews.text: These soundbar sounded muffled. I liked the sk9y sound quality was better don’t like the design but I can get over it when I only paid 449.00 for it. With better sound. I know there is better Soundbars out there but really wanted to have everything LG
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Unobtrusive and delivers outstanding sound. I am pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome experience!
customer_reviews.text: Had difficulty getting everything hooked up correctly because quick start guide was way too quick. But overall sound quality and value made up for a.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Once Set up correctly, OUTSTANDING SOUND!
customer_reviews.text: This took a bit to set up to an LG TV, however once it was done. WOW!
customer_reviews.author: coach georgeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a good soundbar but the upward firing atmos speakers arent that strong.
customer_reviews.author: Richard capps

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for a couple months. Then garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a few months. Now the sound cuts out constantly and Amazon won’t stand by the product. Buyer beware. Bad product and poor customer service. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Ü

customer_reviews.title: Costly but worth it
customer_reviews.text: You can understand speech and music much better than built-in TV. speakers
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Mays

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound
customer_reviews.text: Works great but I have experienced issues with it staying connected to the TV after shutting down power to TV requiring the soundbar to be reconnected to the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recent firmware update fixed this soundbar. It’s a winner now
customer_reviews.text: A Firmware update has fixed the center speaker issue. So watching a few films in the last few days has been great. I’m planning on purchasing the surround speakers to fill out the sound and go 7.1 I’m no audio expert- but this soundbar sounds crisper and richer than a cheapish 5.1 inch multispeaker setup I upgraded from. I haven’t done an Atmos test yet. It’s really simple to use this with my Sony 4k tv which is new enough to have hdmi-arc. It automatically turns on and off with the tv and works invisibily while provided a massive upgrade over standard tv sound.
customer_reviews.author: Naveed Khan

customer_reviews.title: Solid sound and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about purchasing this sound bar after reading some of the reviews. I opted for this soundbar after purchasing an LG OLED tv and they gave me a nice discount at BB. Set up was extremely simple: (hdmi arc from soundbar to the tv) and plug it in. Download the app and run the firmware update. The sound is great and bass is loud for my application. Medium size room with normal ceiling height. Having the sound bar in the correct mode makes all of the difference in the world. I think many of the negative reviews are user error. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TNTITAN

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound bar. I use it with my LG 65SM9000PUA Nano 9 Series 65" 4K Ultra HD Smart LED NanoCell TV (2019). It works perfectly with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Brock

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound With LG C8 65”
customer_reviews.text: Get it! Sound Amazing. Love blast base and movie movie mode. Voice is super clear. Enjoying Netflix Amazon videos more than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jags Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great, but if you put your subwoofer at a distance, it can disconnect
customer_reviews.text: pretty much a spectacular sound system. it's phenomenal. i got it for my apartment. only thing i dont like is that i have to have it near my speaker, at the same level otherwise it disconnects and gets distorted. if anyone has advice on how to fix it, please share!
customer_reviews.author: Ashar

product_meta.title: LG SK10Y 5.1.2 Channel Hi-Res Audio Sound Bar with Dolby Atmos (2018)
product_meta.description: The SK10Y home theater sound system brings a host of premium audio refinements. Dolby Atmos renders a three-dimensional sound field, now with independent volume control for the overhead channels. Audiophile-grade speaker design is enhanced with Meridian Audio technology for superior bass and voice clarity, with support for High-Resolution music files. A special stand is available* to blend the sound bar seamlessly with select LG OLED and SUPER UHD TVs. It’s also smart home-ready, designed to work with Google Assistant voice control as well as the convenience of built-in Chromecast for seamless streaming of music*. * The TK10 stand is available separately ** Internet access and optional service subscriptions required, sold separately.
feature_bullets: Meridian Audio - Technology from the renowned experts at Meridian Audio combines advanced signal processing and hardware design to expand image height and widen the sound field.
Dolby Atmos - Experience cinematic sound at home: With Dolby Atmos, the action can move anywhere in three-dimensional space, including above the listener for the ultimate in surround audio.
High Resolution Audio - Digital music for audiophiles, with higher sampling rates and bit depth, both of which can contribute to more accurate, more enjoyable music listening.
Chromecast Compatible - Works seamlessly with popular music apps like Pandora and Google Play Music, enabling wireless audio from a compatible phone or tablet, laptop or Chromebook.
Works with the Google Assistant.Soundbar Power Consumption:46 W.Bluetooth 4.0

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars78 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
